Based on your preferences, here are some recommendations:

- Unstoppable (2010) directed by David Hemmings stars Chase Masterson, H.M. Wynant, John Newton. A sharp-minded girl named Hoyle finds herself on the trail of a reclusive genius. But her work takes a series of unforeseen twists as events around her grow increasingly fragmented... disconnected... surreal. With an ethereal lounge singer and her loyal partner as her only allies, Hoyle is plunged into a dark world of intrigue and earth-shattering cosmological secrets. Haunted by an ever- present shadow whom she is destined to face, Hoyle discovers that the most powerful force in the universe -- the power to bend reality, the power to know the truth  -- lies within the depths of the human heart.
Based on the plot and actors mentioned, you might enjoy watching Unstoppable (2010) directed by David Hemmings stars Chase Masterson, H.M. Wynant, John Newton.
